original_title: あの夏、張り込み捜査中巨乳な先輩と交わりまくった…。 高橋しょう子
overview: Takasho is a titty female investigator, who is mounting guard at a hideout to catch some criminal scum.  It’s the middle of the summer, and she is in this small room that doesn’t have an aircon. Things are getting very sweaty, and she suddenly notices his male partner…
title: That Summer, I Fucked The Big Titty Supervisor I Was On A Stakeout With Like Crazy... Shoko Takahashi
